body:
Can you clarify further what _taken by the size limit_ means. I have enough context to know what's going on but can see how a new person reading this doesn't understand what goes on. Can you mention size limit is in bytes, and what an example output is. E.g. `vector{vector{f16}, vector{f16, f16, f16}, vector{f32, f32}}` or something along those lines.

Also some typos.
